text: John Cygan (April 27, 1954 â€“ May 13, 2017) was an American actor and comedian. He was born in New York City. Cygan was known for his roles as Detective Paulie Pentangeli in The Commish, as Twitch in Toy Story 3 and as "Big Red" in Monsters University. He also provided the voice as Solidus Snake in the Metal Gear Solid video game franchise. Cygan died of cancer at his Los Angeles, California home on May 13, 2017, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American video game actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
title: John Cygan
